definition: to pronounce a word after mentally processing its spelling/(phonics) blending
to piece together/to join together/to stake all/adventurous/at the risk of one's life/to spell
to read/to study/reading of word (i.e. pronunciation), similar to 拼音[pin1 yin1]

sentences.english: How do you recite the first refuge in Pali?
sentences.chinese: 三皈依的第一条，在巴利文如何拼读？

sentences.english: Students look and talk about the pictures in pairs.
sentences.chinese: 学生看图并复述，拼读单词。

sentences.english: To grasp phonics of each unit.
sentences.chinese: 掌握每个单元发音法的拼读。

sentences.english: How do you spell your name ?
Teach children a range of multi-sensory strategies to support an investigative approach to spelling.
sentences.chinese: 教学生多种策略，方法来进行拼读。

sentences.english: Pleautomotive service engineers tell me how to spell the English word.
sentences.chinese: 请告诉我怎样拼读这个英文字。

sentences.english: Did you know the letters in "listen" also spell "silent"?
sentences.chinese: 你可曾知“倾听”也可拼读成“沉默”？

sentences.english: Please tell me how to spell English word.
sentences.chinese: 请告诉我怎样拼读这个英文字。

sentences.english: Could you spell that for me , please?
sentences.chinese: 请您拼读一下您的姓名好吗？

sentences.english: Girls, can you spell the word?
sentences.chinese: 女孩们，你们会拼读这个单词吗？

sentences.english: Can you spell it? Sorry, I can't.
sentences.chinese: 你能拼读它吗？对不起，我不能。

sentences.english: Excuse me, can you spell your name ?
sentences.chinese: 请问，你能拼读你的名字吗？

sentences.english: Please tell me how to spell the English word.
sentences.chinese: 请告诉我怎样拼读这个英文字。

definition: new character (in textbook)/character that is unfamiliar or not yet studied
(of a pupil) to write down (in a dictation exercise)/dictation/(music) to transcribe by ear
Hanyu Pinyin, the romanization system used in the PRC since the 1960s
new word (in textbook)/word that is unfamiliar or not yet studied/CL:組|组[zu3],個|个[ge4]
